solution.text:
Side of larger cube,\(a=_{{j*k}}_\,cm\)
Volume of larger cube\(=a^3=_{{(j*k)**3}}_\,cm^3\)
The cube is cut into \(_{{k**3}}_\) smaller cubes of equal volume.
Volume of smaller cube\(=\frac{_{{(j*k)**3}}_}{_{{k**3}}_}\)
\(=_{{j**3}}_\,cm^3\)
Side of smaller cube\(=\sqrt[3]{_{{j**3}}_}\)
\(=_{j}_\,cm\)

content.text: A solid cube of side \(_{{j*k}}_\)cm is cut into \(_{{k**3}}_\) cubes of equal volume. What is the side of the new cube?
